mcq.statement: Choose the correct Indirect speech: The policeman said to the violent crowd, "Stop all this or you will be arrested"?

options.a: The policeman ordered the violent crowd to stop all that or they would be arrested
options.b: The policeman advised the violent crowd to stop or else be arrested
options.c: The policeman said to the violent crowd that they should stop or else be arrested
options.d: The policeman said to the violent crowd to stop all this or be arrested
